seg.line: 惟博識君子裁覽其義焉。

tls:text.tls:srcline: 惟博識君子裁覽其義焉。

sense.def: If only S!, my sincely hope is that S.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 惟博識君子裁覽其義焉。
惟博識君子裁覽其義焉。
惟博識君子裁覽其義焉。

sense.def: commendatory/honorific: members of the ruling class; men of superior rank 君子食其味焉

tls:text.tls:srcline: 惟博識君子裁覽其義焉。
惟博識君子裁覽其義焉。

sense.def: review intellectually; gain a full intellectual survey of, gain an overview of

tls:text.tls:srcline: 惟博識君子裁覽其義焉。

sense.def: 義 often translates skr. artha 'truth' in Buddhist translations

tls:text.tls:srcline: 惟博識君子裁覽其義焉。

sense.def: underlying meaning of a term; import of a text; message

men of outstanding excellence; sages and worthies; sage men of worth
none of the Ns as object of V
make a display of; bring to everyone's attention
symbol for N; symbolic representation of N
standard method; objective standard or measure by which to judge things; standard rule (e.g. on clothing to be worn)
a sound standard of judgment, sound judgment
often graded: hold in high(er) esteem; set great store by, prize highly; regard as very important
＝貴於 value N1 higher than N2
know how to assess properly, be able to judge professionally
value N1 more highly than N2
arithmetics; calculation of an amount; calculation of the relevant advantages
the fine arts; required cultural skills
individual; person (as having it's own features)
subjective motivation: on these grounds; for that subjective reason; that is why, thus
have the temerity to; presume; venture to, have the audacity to (do something in front of a superior); make bold to; take the liberty of V-ing
using this contextually determinate method> and thus, and in this way
individual; person (as having it's own features)
official, belonging to the duties of officials; relevant to officialdom
those people who have talents for the function N2
one who takes official care of a some business> officer (SHU)
understand properly; understand and respect properly; be sure of the workings (of something);
belonging to people; human, designated for men, belonging to human beings; designed for human consumption
sometimes: degree of wisdom 愚人之智
the large number of, all the many, all the various, all sorts of
come to have (not having tried to get)
proper rank in a hierarchical order
the right kind of, the appropriate, the relevant, the suitable 其人
subjective motivation: on these grounds; for that subjective reason; that is why, thus
abstract symbolic shape or figure; symbol, symbolisation
K: change as expressed in the lines of the Yijing hexagram
true gentleman; a person of superior character; the person of superior character 得見君子者斯可矣。
petty person, person of deficient moral character
人師,民師 teacher, guiding authority; sometimes specifically: music master
cause (a person N) to be completely successful, cause a person to realise himself completely
the origin of this; the history of this
=所來 what something comes from> origin
make explicit a distinction between the Ns
all the lands of the world
differ with respect to; differ in respect of; be different from

seg.line: 是以聖人立其教不易其方，

tls:text.tls:srcline: 是以聖人立其教不易其方，

sense.def: subjective motivation: on these grounds; for that subjective reason; that is why, thus

tls:text.tls:srcline: 是以聖人立其教不易其方，

sense.def: the sage FAYAN 21.1 聖人之術 "the art of the Sage (i.e. Confucius)" (with tensed predicate)

tls:text.tls:srcline: 是以聖人立其教不易其方，
是以聖人立其教不易其方，

sense.def: training; drill; moral instruction; instruction; proper indoctrination
dominate systematically; have and keep effective and systematic control of; exercise political control over; organise occasionally inchoative; gain control over
administration of a state, public administration; administrative measure; administrative method; administrative tasks and problems; administrative practice
change; change and improve; change and bring under control
the authoritative texts of music, predecessors of the 樂記
Rites; name of a compendium of ritual rules current, later: the classics of Ritual
